definition: home-loving/to feel a strong attachment to home life/to begrudge being away from home
to feel attached to/to long for/to love

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 傢伙|家伙[jia1 huo5]

sentences.english: I long for family, because family is the best haven.
sentences.chinese: 我恋家，因为家是最好的避风港。

sentences.english: Who would have thought that my honeysuckle , and she did love home.
sentences.chinese: 有谁会想到，我的金银花，她那样恋家。

sentences.english: Cancerians have a deep love for home, and they truly treasure their friends and family.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹座的人是个恋家控，他们视朋友家人为珍宝。

sentences.english: I was a family man, love does not need the reason.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个恋家的男人，恋家不需要理由。

sentences.english: I was a family man, love does not need the reason.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个恋家的男人，恋家不需要理由。

sentences.english: She's a family person, so am I.
sentences.chinese: 她是个恋家的人，我也是。

sentences.english: I will think naught of my family when I am in the market place for this will cloud my thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 身在职场，不可恋家，否则那会使我思想混饨。

sentences.english: I was quite a proverb for it at Maple Grove.
sentences.chinese: 在枫园，我的恋家是尽人皆知的。

sentences.english: In the summer, the wolves are homebodies, taking care of new pups.
sentences.chinese: 通常而言，夏天的狼群是“恋家”的，同时照顾小狼。

sentences.english: "Love" is a good lead from Ruili to the excellent source of strength.
sentences.chinese: “恋家”是带领瑞丽从优秀到卓越的力量源泉。

sentences.english: He really loves his family, and returns home once a week.
sentences.chinese: 他真是恋家，一周总要回去一趟。

definition: homesick
see 懷舊|怀旧[huai2 jiu4]
to take care of one's family
to remember old friends/to cherish old friendships/for old time's sake
(of a child) clingy/(of a pet) fond of interacting with people/friendly
filial/dutiful/devoted to one's parents (and grandparents etc)/to show filial piety towards (an older family member)/filial piety
male chauvinism
partner (in four person game)/family of proposed marriage partner
see 刀子嘴，豆腐心[dao1 zi5 zui3 , dou4 fu5 xin1]
person living or traveling far from home
to miss/to remember with longing/to long to see again
lone/lonely/loneliness
melancholy and moody (idiom); depressed personality
sensible/thoughtful/intelligent
to drift (in the tide)/to rove/to lead a wandering existence/drifter/wanderer
workaholic
